rows.label: tlk42350261_01_msg0001
rows.name:
No matter how peaceful a place is,
nothing is absolute, mo. There's no
harm in having the power to fight, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350261_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm sure a customer like you wouldn't
misuse a weapon, mo. As a merchant,
Nokonoko trusts you, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350261_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I believe that your power
will bring peace, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350261_01_msg0004
rows.name:
You don't need it now, mo? It's
always good to be prepared for
battle ahead of time, mo.
